channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- XClarity Administrator (LXCA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- XClarity Administrator (LXCA)

item.title: CVE-2019-6181|2024-09-17T01:21:39.959Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator%20%28lxca%29
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability was reported in Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA) versions prior to 2.5.0 that could allow a crafted URL, if visited, to cause JavaScript code to be executed in the user's web browser. The JavaScript code is not executed on LXCA itself.
